item.title: A Snapshot of the coronavirus outbreak in Germany in April 2020
item.description:
This is my attempt to visualize some SARS-CoV-2 data with some R code (please pardon the non-optimal layout). German data is obtained from the Robert Koch Institute. Data used from March 15-April 4, 2020 (not updated every day). For more extensive information about SARS-CoV-2 in Germany in English, see here.
Cumulative number of confirmed SARS-CoV-2 cases in Germany in linear scale since 100th case Only the top 10 states with the highest number of cases are plotted.
